content.p: Cookies help us to give you the best experience on our website. You can change your cookie settings if you wish. Otherwise we'll assume you're OK to continue.OKSee our policy Help us to provide a great study environment for everyone. Our silent study areas are a great place for focused individual study. To help, we ask that students please remember to: If youâ€™re studying in a silent area and are being disturbed by noise, please tell a member of Library staff or contact us by WhatsApp or Live Chat. WhatsApp numbers are shown below and the Live Chat widget will show on this page when staff are online. For general help and support, please contact Library staff in-person or by telephone, email or LiveChat.
